<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.getAvailableFormSections</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Returns an array of Sys IDs that indicate which Form Sections are accesible for targeting.
This is used in a Dynamic Filter Option for the sys_embedded_tour_element.form_section dynamic reference qualifier.</description>
        <name>getAvailableFormSections</name>
        <script><![CDATA[// policyTableName is the name of the table the UI Policy
// applies to
function getAvailableFormSections(tableName) {
	var formSectionIds = [];
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_form_section');
	var queryString = "sys_ui_form.nameSTARTSWITH" + tableName;
	gr.orderBy('position');
	gr.addEncodedQuery(queryString);
	gr.query();
	
	while (gr.next()) {
		if (gr.position != "0") {
			formSectionIds.push(gr.sys_id.toString());
		}
	}

	return formSectionIds;
}]]></script>
